landingText.title: Graduating Senior at Rochester Institute of Technology
landingText.subtitle: Concentration on Web Development and Databases

aboutText.p1: Hello, I'm Ethan! I am an aspiring data analyst and full-stack developer. I graduated Rochester Institute of Technology with a degree in Computing and Information Technology in 2024.
aboutText.p2: I have always had a passion for technology, ever since I was little. Currently, I'm interested in working with large datasets, making cool websites, and automation.
aboutText.p3: Outside of the technical things, I enjoy rock climbing, fitness, hiking, music, and spending time with friends and family.
aboutText.p4: Feel free to get in touch with me, my contact information is listed below.

projects.title: Meteor Landing Website
projects.description: Project to display meteor landings from NASA's dataset
